query:
UPDATE email_verifications
               SET verified_at = NOW()
               WHERE token_hash = $1
                 AND expires_at > NOW()
                 AND verified_at IS NULL
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         user_id,
                         email,
                         token_hash,
                         expires_at as "expires_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         verified_at as "verified_at: DateTime<Utc>",
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
